item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Saturday, March 15, 2025 at 5:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. RubyLLM: A delightful Ruby way to work with AI (153 points | 19 comments)
2. Transformers Without Normalization (17 points | discuss)
3. Show HN: eli – Embedded Lisp Interpreter (24 points | discuss)
4. Experts warn about the 'crumbling infrastructure' of federal government data (55 points | 7 comments)
5. Kerning, the Hard Way (146 points | 39 comments)
6. Athena landed in a dark crater where the temperature was minus 280° F / 173° C (125 points | 168 comments)
7. Briar: Peer to Peer Encrypted Messaging (243 points | 88 comments)
8. I'm Peter Roberts, immigration attorney who does work for YC and startups. AMA (219 points | 326 comments)
9. Decrypting encrypted files from Akira ransomware using a bunch of GPUs (154 points | 29 comments)
10. Apple will soon support encrypted RCS messaging with Android users (187 points | 104 comments)
11. Optifye.ai (YC W25) Is Hiring ( | hide)
12. Show HN: Online Python Compiler with Libraries (9 points | 4 comments)
13. Why do transit agencies keep falling for the hydrogen bus myth? (141 points | 210 comments)

16. Samsung Q990D unresponsive after 1020 firmware update (555 points | 473 comments)

18. Popular GitHub Action tj-actions/changed-files is compromised (158 points | 107 comments)

20. 'Once in a Century' Proof Settles Math's Kakeya Conjecture (25 points | discuss)
21. New York Times shut down Tor Onion service (195 points | 117 comments)
22. Exo: Exocompilation for productive programming of hardware accelerators (58 points | 15 comments)
23. The Ozempocalypse Is Nigh (37 points | 29 comments)
24. Block Diffusion: Interpolating between autoregressive and diffusion models (117 points | 29 comments)
25. Rembrandt to Picasso: Five ways to spot a fake masterpiece (19 points | 9 comments)
26. Show HN: Web Audio Spring-Mass Synthesis (21 points | 3 comments)
27. Show HN: Open-Source MCP Server for Context and AI Tools (27 points | 8 comments)
28. A 2FA app that tells you when you get `314159` (2024) (195 points | 93 comments)
29. Owl: Optimized Workforce Learning for multi-agent collaboration (29 points | 1 comment)
30. An Egyptian Temple Reborn (15 points | discuss)
